Sentencas: Pyrochlore oxide A(2)B(2)O(7) is a potential anode catalyst of ammonia-fed solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) due to its unique and open structure that can make some oxygen ions flow to occupy the hole position to form Frankel defect.
Titulo: Tuning geometry distortion of pyrochlore RE2Zr1.95Ni0.05O7+δ anodes with rich oxygen vacancies for ammonia-fed solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Herein, various rare-earth ions with different radius are selected as the A site to construct defective pyrochlore oxide RE2Zr1.95Ni0.05O7+delta (REZN, RE = La, Pr, Nd, Sm, Gd, LZN/PZN/NZN/SZN/GZN) to gain insights into oxygen vacancies that can be the diffusion and adsorption active site for ammonia.
Titulo: Tuning geometry distortion of pyrochlore RE2Zr1.95Ni0.05O7+δ anodes with rich oxygen vacancies for ammonia-fed solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In the n-type semiconductor REZN, the degree of crystal ordering decreases with the decrease of the radius of rare-earth RE3+ ions.
Titulo: Tuning geometry distortion of pyrochlore RE2Zr1.95Ni0.05O7+δ anodes with rich oxygen vacancies for ammonia-fed solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Among them, GZN exhibits the most negative conduction band and the smallest band gap, making it easier to overcome the energy potential barrier and facilitate the movement of carriers.
Titulo: Tuning geometry distortion of pyrochlore RE2Zr1.95Ni0.05O7+δ anodes with rich oxygen vacancies for ammonia-fed solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: As a result, the conductivity of GZN is about 25 times higher than that of LZN.
Titulo: Tuning geometry distortion of pyrochlore RE2Zr1.95Ni0.05O7+δ anodes with rich oxygen vacancies for ammonia-fed solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The average TEC value of GZN is 10.40 x 10(-6) K-1, which matches that of electrolyte YSZ (10.50 x 10(-6) K-1).
Titulo: Tuning geometry distortion of pyrochlore RE2Zr1.95Ni0.05O7+δ anodes with rich oxygen vacancies for ammonia-fed solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The maximum power density of ammonia-fed SOFC supported by YSZ electrolyte based on GZN anode is 128.63 mW center dot cm(-2) at 800 degrees C, which is 2.3 times higher than that of NiO-based SOFC.
Titulo: Tuning geometry distortion of pyrochlore RE2Zr1.95Ni0.05O7+δ anodes with rich oxygen vacancies for ammonia-fed solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The single cell based on GZN anode can be run continuously for 100 h at 800 degrees C without significant degradation.
Titulo: Tuning geometry distortion of pyrochlore RE2Zr1.95Ni0.05O7+δ anodes with rich oxygen vacancies for ammonia-fed solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The preliminary results suggest that GZN oxide is promising to be a candidate catalyst for ammonia-fed SOFC anode.
Titulo: Tuning geometry distortion of pyrochlore RE2Zr1.95Ni0.05O7+δ anodes with rich oxygen vacancies for ammonia-fed solid oxide fuel cell
